statements: SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_tracking
SELECT drug_name, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_tracking ORDER BY data_collected DESC
SELECT drug_name, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_tracking WHERE resistance_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_tracking WHERE data_collected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT pathogen_id, drug_name, data_source FROM drug_resistance_tracking ORDER BY pathogen_id ASC
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_tracking WHERE resistance_level = 'High' ORDER BY data_collected DESC
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) FROM drug_resistance_tracking GROUP BY drug_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM drug_resistance_tracking
SELECT pathogen_id, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_tracking WHERE data_collected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY pathogen_id
SELECT MAX(data_collected) AS latest_data_collected FROM drug_resistance_tracking
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, pathogen_id, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_data WHERE resistance_level = 'High';
SELECT pathogen_name, pathogen_type FROM pathogen_metadata;
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_data ORDER BY testing_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, pathogen_id FROM drug_resistance_data WHERE testing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_data JOIN pathogen_metadata ON drug_resistance_data.pathogen_id = pathogen_metadata.pathogen_id WHERE patient_id = 1;

SELECT patient_id, pathogen_name, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_data JOIN pathogen_metadata ON drug_resistance_data.pathogen_id = pathogen_metadata.pathogen_id WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY testing_date DESC;

SELECT patient_id, pathogen_name, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_data JOIN pathogen_metadata ON drug_resistance_data.pathogen_id = pathogen_metadata.pathogen_id WHERE resistance_level = 'High' AND pathogen_type = 'Bacteria';

SELECT patient_id, pathogen_name, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_data JOIN pathogen_metadata ON drug_resistance_data.pathogen_id = pathogen_metadata.pathogen_id ORDER BY patient_id ASC, testing_date DESC;

SELECT patient_id, pathogen_name, resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_data JOIN pathogen_metadata ON drug_resistance_data.pathogen_id = pathogen_metadata.pathogen_id WHERE testing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_trends;
SELECT pathogen_id, drug_type FROM drug_resistance_trends WHERE drug_resistance_level > 2;
SELECT pathogen_info.pathogen_name, surveillance_data.collected_from FROM pathogen_info INNER JOIN surveillance_data ON pathogen_info.pathogen_id = surveillance_data.pathogen_id;
SELECT * FROM surveillance_data WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT origin_country FROM pathogen_info;
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance_trends WHERE drug_type='Antibiotic' AND drug_resistance_level > 3 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT pathogen_name, species FROM pathogen_info ORDER BY pathogen_name ASC;
SELECT collected_from, collection_date FROM surveillance_data WHERE pathogen_id = 12345 AND collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;

SELECT pathogen_info.pathogen_name, surveillance_data.collected_from FROM pathogen_info JOIN surveillance_data ON pathogen_info.pathogen_id = surveillance_data.pathogen_id WHERE surveillance_data.record_id = 1001;

SELECT MAX(drug_resistance_level) AS max_resistance_level, MIN(drug_resistance_level) AS min_resistance_level FROM drug_resistance_trends GROUP BY drug_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY max_resistance_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pathogens;
SELECT name, type FROM Pathogens WHERE resistance_level='High';
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sample_type DESC;

SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, Patients.gender, ResistanceData.resistance_type FROM Patients JOIN ResistanceData ON Patients.patient_id = ResistanceData.patient_id WHERE ResistanceData.resistance_level='Low';
SELECT Samples.* FROM Samples JOIN Pathogens ON Samples.pathogen_id = Pathogens.id WHERE Pathogens.type='Virus';
SELECT * FROM Pathogens WHERE type = 'Bacteria';
SELECT sample_id, collection_date FROM Samples WHERE sample_type = 'Blood';
SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, ResistanceData.resistance_type FROM Patients INNER JOIN ResistanceData ON Patients.patient_id = ResistanceData.patient_id WHERE Patients.age > 50;

SELECT Pathogens.name, Samples.collection_date, ResistanceData.resistance_level FROM Pathogens INNER JOIN Samples ON Pathogens.id = Samples.pathogen_id INNER JOIN ResistanceData ON Samples.sample_id = ResistanceData.sample_id WHERE Pathogens.resistance_level = 'High';
SELECT DISTINCT Pathogens.type FROM Pathogens INNER JOIN Samples ON Pathogens.id = Samples.pathogen_id WHERE Samples.collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pathogens;
SELECT pathogen_name, pathogen_species FROM pathogens ORDER BY pathogen_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance WHERE resistance_level = 'High';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT trend_type, trend_description FROM trends WHERE date_start < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT pathogen_name, pathogen_species FROM pathogens WHERE pathogen_species = 'Bacteria';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_resistance WHERE resistance_level = 'High' AND date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_name, drug_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE date_prescribed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
